participant_1.background:
I am a competitive body builder.
I am color blind and live with my little sister.
My personal ideal is theodore roosevelt.
I ran a blog about rabbit rescues.
My favorite singer is tim mcgraw.

participant_2.background:
I have three children all girls.
I am divorced.
I was born in the late was.
I love the band heart.

content.text: Hi! I'm participant_1.
Hi! I'm participant_2.
What do you do for fun?
I like to read, watch movies, and hang out with my kids.
I like to read and watch movies too! What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read all kinds of books, but I'm especially into historical fiction and romance novels.
Those are my favorites too! I love learning about different cultures and time periods.
Me too! I love being transported to another world when I read a book.
What's your favorite book you've read recently?
My favorite book I've read recently is The Book of Negroes by Lawrence Hill. It's a historical novel about a free black woman who is kidnapped and forced to work as a slave in Nova Scotia.
That sounds like a really good book! I'll have to check it out.
I highly recommend it! What's your favorite movie?
My favorite movie is The Sound of Music. It's such a heartwarming and inspiring story.
Me too! I love Julie Andrews and Christopher Plummer in that movie.
I know, right? They're so perfect for their roles.
So, what else do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to the gym and lift weights. I'm also a competitive body builder.
Wow, that's impressive! I've never been to the gym before.
You should try it sometime! It's a great way to get in shape and de-stress.
I might have to give it a try.
I hope you do! It's a lot of fun.
Well, it was nice meeting you, participant_2.
It was nice meeting you too, participant_1.
